<rule id="javaee-pom-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project/m:packaging/text()[windup:matches(self::node(), '{not-jar}')]">
                    <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="The expected project artifact's extension is `jar`">
                    <message>
                        The project artifact's current extension (i.e. `<packaging>` tag value) is `{not-jar}` but the expected value should be `jar`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#build-tool-maven" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                    <quickfix name="delete-packaging" type="DELETE_LINE">
                        <search><packaging>{not-jar}</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="not-jar">
                <matches pattern="^(?!jar).*$"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
